snippet: After the authorities in Orange County said three homeless men were fatally stabbed last month by the same person, shelters reported a sharp increase in demand.
abstract: Homeless people in Orange County, Calif, have been running to shelters in search of a safe place after the separate stabbing deaths of three homeless men; authorities believe there is a serial killer stalking the homeless based on similarities in the three killings.
lead_paragraph: After the authorities in Orange County said three homeless men were fatally stabbed last month by the same person, shelters reported a sharp increase in demand.

headline.seo: Hunt for a Serial Killer Sends Homeless to Shelters in California
headline.main: Fear of a Serial Killer Sends the Homeless to Shelters in California
headline.print_headline: Fear of a Serial Killer Sends the Homeless to Shelters in California
